sentences.english: The event is organized by Malaysia Foreign Affairs University.

sentences.english: Wang Yan, associate professor at Foreign Affairs College is the presenter for theme one.

sentences.english: He has also studied at Chinese universities including the Foreign Affairs College in Beijing and Anhui University.
sentences.chinese: 此前，他曾在安徽大学和北京的外交学院学习。
